ygData.subject: RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, E ci s version of the event got screwed up by some greedy high leevls.  Most all of the good NPC s were killed and I don t think anyone got rewarded
ygData.messageBody:
Well, E'ci's version of the event got screwed up by some greedy high
leevls. Most all of the good NPC's were killed and I don't think
anyone got rewarded except for those who got to loot the undead and
dark elves (read greedy high level bastards). The high levels weren't
all bad, though, some would leave the loot if they couldn't use it and
broadcast to the zone where it was...so some greedy high level
(who probably couldn't use it) would come and pick it up. Bitter?
Nah. Actually I only died once in the whole thing, when I was blinded
by Innoruk's hate. Friend of mine died at least 3 times and lost exp
everytime. My guess for the portal is Kithicor or Nektulos forest. I
doubt they'd put a portal in a town, even if it is Neriak. I just
wish I had something to show for my 3 hours of running around the
continent.

Robynn Merrilin, still 24th, E'ci

--
Katy Westerman Don't lick something unless
katyw@... you really mean it.
http://www.cs.ucr.edu/~katyw -Advice from the Naked
CS/Comp Math Major, UC Riverside Dancing Llama
